DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : Evaluate efficacy alternate day prednisone versus daily fish oil supplement slow prevent decline renal function child , adolescent , young adult moderate severe immunoglobulin A nephropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Alternate Day Prednisone Daily Fish Oil Supplements Patients With Immunoglobulin A Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , placebo control , multicenter study . Patients randomize one three treatment arm : placebo , prednisone , fish oil . The placebo arm randomize receive either fish oil placebo capsule prednisone placebo tablet . Arm I : Patients receive placebo tablet capsule 2 year . Arm II : Patients receive taper regimen prednisone tablet administer every day 2 year absence unacceptable toxicity . Arm III : Patients receive fish oil capsule daily 2 year . Patients may also receive enalapril hypertension . Patients follow every 3 month 3 year treatment .
